questions.question: What are tokens and how do they work?
questions.answer: Tokens are the unit of measurement for our translation service. Each word in your subtitle file typically costs 1-3 tokens to translate, depending on complexity and language pair. Our plans provide different daily token allowances to match your volume needs.

questions.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan later?
questions.answer: Yes, you can change your plan at any time. If you upgrade, you'll be charged the prorated difference for the remainder of your billing cycle. If you downgrade, the new rate will apply at the start of your next billing cycle.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and certain regional payment methods. For enterprise customers, we also support invoicing.

questions.question: Is there a refund policy?
questions.answer: We offer a 7-day money-back guarantee for new subscriptions. If you're not satisfied with our service, contact our support team within 7 days of your purchase for a full refund.
